评论概述: Medium too small, large too big
评论详情: 5'4", 165lbs, ~32DD/34D. Have a little bit of a tummy but nothing crazy (most of my weight is in my hipsand thighs). Very confused on the fit. Tried the medium first; too tight, the inner bra almost didn't touch my underbust, and the bottom rolled up immediately. Ordered a large; the band of the inner bra is bigger overall, but it's like they didn't make the fabric itself bigger, so it feels loose in the back and still too small for my boobs up front. The shirt no longer rolls up as much, but now I have armpit gaping. If I had to choose, I'd go medium. Super disappointed. Guess at least these were cheaper than the Align tanks!

评论概述: True to size. I’m a true medium. 8-10 in lululemon
评论详情: I ordered this in medium because large was sold out. The material I prefer more for workout than the lululemon align tank because the straps don’t fall off my shoulders as easily and it’s more of a workout material. I have like 20 align tanks, so it tells you something if I love this one. I have lat muscles so I often order a 10 in Lulu but I can wear an 8 (the shelf bra is smaller and it isn’t as appealing on the lat fat). This fits in between an 8 and 10 from Lululemon for me because it doesn’t squeeze and fits my 36c comfortably. The band doesn’t ride up and the material is soft. I did order from a few other brands on Amazon and sizing is not comparable between brands. Haha I had to try large and return a few. Medium fits good and I’m curious to see if large would be even better or too big.

评论概述: The band is a big issue.
类型: Size: MediumColor: Heart Floral Leaf White
评论详情: Literally and figuratively. I first ordered an extra large, which fit beautifully everywhere except for the band of the bra portion. It was so loose my boobs kept falling out the bottom. It was so very loose that I returned it and reordered a medium. Well, the band on this one is tight enough, but everything else is way tighter as well. I couldn't maneuver into it over my head so I had to put it on by stepping into it. That is not a big deal, but the way it gave me a bunch of cleavage I didn't really want and fit tightly enough everywhere that I'm not sure I can do yoga in it, which is what I bought it for, is a fair sized issue. I can't decide whether to keep this one, and the other in a different pattern that I noticed was only available in medium so I got it too, or return them for a large. I'm really doubtful the large would have a tight enough band, because the band on the medium is just barely tight enough. If I wanted to spend the money, I would reorder an extra large and have the band taken in. It's cute enough that I'm actually considering that. Darn that band, though.  Edited to add that the band on the large was more too large than the band on the medium, as I expected. I am in fact keeping the extra large and having my seamstress do something about the bra band, because it is just too cute. But they really need to reconsider their sizing on the bra band. Just the bra band
